answers.author: Toby Cotter
answers.text:
Bullhead City, AZ (population 40,000)
Leave Donation: If an employee has exhausted all of his or her personal and vacation leave due to a serious injury or illness involving themselves or a family member, employees may, after authorization of the City Manager, voluntarily donate a portion of their accrued personal or vacation leave on behalf of their fellow employees. To voluntarily donate leave, employees are to send a memorandum to the Human Resources Office identifying the employee to receive the donation and the number of personal or vacation leave hours to be donated.
